description: This operation retrieves information about an event action.

parameters.name: EventActionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the event action.

nested_items.name: ExportRevisionToS3
nested_items.description: Details for the export revision to Amazon S3 action.

nested_items.name: Encryption
nested_items.description: Encryption configuration for the auto export job.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS KMS key you want to use to encrypt the Amazon S3 objects. This parameter is required if you choose aws:kms as an encryption type.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of server side encryption used for encrypting the objects in Amazon S3.

nested_items.name: RevisionDestination
nested_items.description: A revision destination is the Amazon S3 bucket folder destination to where the export will be sent.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that is the destination for the event action.

nested_items.name: KeyPattern
nested_items.description: A string representing the pattern for generated names of the individual assets in the revision. For more information about key patterns, see Key patterns when exporting revisions.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the event action.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the event action was created, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: RevisionPublished
nested_items.description: What occurs to start the revision publish action.

nested_items.name: DataSetId
nested_items.description: The data set ID of the published revision.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the event action.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the event action was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.
